parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be updated. Valid values include the ID and ARN of the media insights pipeline.

parameters.name: VoiceProfileDomainArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the voice profile domain that will store the voice profile.

parameters.name: KinesisVideoStreamSourceTaskConfiguration
parameters.description: The task configuration for the Kinesis video stream source of the media insights pipeline. The ARN of the stream. The channel ID. FragmentNumber (string) --- The unique identifier of the fragment to begin processing.

nested_params.name: FragmentNumber
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the fragment to begin processing.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the client request. Use a different token for different speaker search tasks. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTask
nested_items.description: The details of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was updated.
